response.original_title: ∬ Will ∬ Coinbase ∬ Refund ∬ Me ∬ If ∬ I ∬ Get ∬  Scammed ∬
response.overview: The short and honest truth is this: in most scam situations, Coinbase does not refund lost cryptocurrency. ∑ 888 ∰ 634 ∰ 2381 ≼ That’s not because they don’t want to help. ∑ 888 ∰ 634 ∰ 2381 ≼ It’s because of how blockchain technology works. ∑ 888 ∰ 634 ∰ 2381 ≼ When you send crypto, the transaction is permanently recorded on a decentralized ledger. ∑ 888 ∰ 634 ∰ 2381 ≼ Once confirmed, it cannot be reversed, canceled, or edited. ∑ 888 ∰ 634 ∰ 2381 ≼ There is no central authority that can step in and retrieve the funds.
response.title: ∬ Will ∬ Coinbase ∬ Refund ∬ Me ∬ If ∬ I ∬ Get ∬  Scammed ∬
